document_data.name: Zelia
document_data.mainbody: '''Zelia''' was a powerful [[yuan-ti]] [[psionicist]] who planted mental seeds in people all over [[Toril]], who were taken over and became her agents with their own psionic powers, albeit lesser than hers. She used them in a plot of world domination. Her demise started when she became interested in the young [[psion]] [[Arvin]], who had powers similar to hers. In the end, Arvin defeatd Zelia.
